fabric.common
Interface FastSerializable

All Known Implementing Classes:
Glob, ObjectDB.PendingTransaction, SerializedObject, TransactionID, UpdateMap
public interface FastSerializable

A common interface for all classes that implement custom serialization. It's called FastSerializable because Java serialization is so frick'n slow.

(We'd call this "FabricSerializable", but then that kinda sounds like a Fabric object that's somehow "serializable".)
